summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Utility Local Improvement District No. 6725 for the improvement of 9th Avenue from Alder Street to Jefferson Street, and from James Street to Seneca Street, and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and the necessary appurtenances; amending Section 6 of Ordinance 109285 to bring the Account and Collection Charge stated under Payment Option \#3 into conformance with the current amount chargeable pursuant to Seattle Municipal Code Section 20.04.270H.
